Returns the root node that must be added to the scene graph.

getAttachmentNode

javax.media.j3d.Group getAttachmentNode()
Returns the node to which children of this J3DTopologyObject must be attached to.

Returns:
The Group node use to attach child objects.

isVisible

Returns whether the current object is shown.

Returns:
True is object is visible, false otherwise.

setVisible

void setVisible(boolean visible)
Set the object visibility.

Parameters:
visible - True make the object visible, false makes it invisible.

Returns the Topology node associated to this object.

the topology node listened by this object.

the Node, that is the actual object in the scene.
